attributes.action: Make Teachers and Supermarket Assistants high priority groups for COVID vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Put teachers and school employees such as cleaners and caterers, and any person who works in a supermarket, into the top priority groups for COVID vaccinations
attributes.background: These two groups have become forgotten about in this pandemic- the general public acts as though these groups are immune to COVID because they work in the front line too- I think our hard work through multiple lockdowns must be recognised, feeding and educating the nation one day at a time

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Prioritise Key Retail Workers, being offered the Covid Vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
